tweet: Hearing the truth might not be easy, but a light shined on the truth means we can stop wandering through life in the dark.
If we insist on not changing, we will remain the person we are. And if we remain who we are, why should tomorrow be better than yesterday?
If you’re uncomfortable hearing something about yourself, chances are it might be true. Don’t rush to defenses. Consider it. Let it sink in.
Fulfillment exists outside your comfort zone. What is uncomfortable at first can bring us an incredible sense of fulfillment in the end.
By separating the source & circumstance from any criticism, we might find after careful consideration there is a helpful message for us.
There’s always something we could change – something that would enhance the quality of our lives, and the lives of those around us.
Hearing the truth isn’t easy. It might not be what we want to hear, but it’s usually what we need to hear.
Envelop yourself with the kind of people you strive to become and it will be nearly impossible for you not to bring out your best self.
There is an energy exchange that happens in every interaction between people. Choose your friends wisely, and choose to lift each other up.
On the road of life, those you choose to bring along for the ride will greatly influence your destination.
There is something magical that happens when we surround ourselves with positive people. They influence us in ways the eye can’t even see.
A real friend will give it to you straight what is beautiful about you, and what it is that you need to change.
We don’t have to agree with other people’s opinions, but being respectful of them means at least considering them.
Friendship is everything. It is so important to have people there when we need them, and to not feel alone.
Hurt people hurt people. No matter what someone has done to you, someone has usually done something worse to them.
RT @RavBerg: It's like the boomerang. You give out negative or positive energy, that's what you're going to get back.
RT @RavBerg: God looks on everyone equally.
RT @RavBerg: Whatever is less is more.
We can't underestimate the benefits of change. We can always better ourselves, and in doing so improve our quality of life.
We can passively live the life we have, or we can create the one we want.
One way we can protect our relationships is understanding that it doesn't really matter who is right or who is wrong.
If you can dream it, you can do it. The trick is to spend less time dreaming and more time doing.
What you envision to be your greatest potential is only a fraction of what you can actually achieve.
We are only as strong as our environment. A seed can’t grow into a mighty oak without the nurturing surroundings.
We cannot help but be affected by that which we choose to engage with. Choose wisely.
Love can give you the strength to overcome what you think you cannot.
If someone is going through pain, sit with them & help bear the burden. It's sometimes all we can do, but always the least we can do.
"Many have come to realize that their destiny is tied up with our destiny. We cannot walk alone." - Dr. King, I Have A Dream speech
No matter what is happening, it’s always our choice to see the good and appreciate the blessings around us.
Your soul is perfect – and that’s the real you.
You never know what someone might be going through. People suffer in silence. Be compassionate with everyone you meet.
We aren’t defined by what we do, but by how we are.
Happiness is a choice. Always.
If there is a part of yourself or your life that you’re not happy with, don’t waste a moment. Change it now.
Be strong and don’t give up the fight. Whatever challenge you are facing, you will overcome it. You first have to know that you can.
The wrong choice can become the right one as soon as we learn the lesson it was meant to teach us.
You are beautiful as you are, inside and out. If you don’t know how beautiful you are, how can you expect anyone else to?
Kindness is reciprocated not necessarily by those we give it to, but always by the universe unto us.
Everything in this moment is perfect as it is. We might not understand it, but we can choose to trust it.
To live in the present we must have an awareness of what it truly is: A result of the past, and an opportunity to create our future.
Celebrate life every day. The very air we breathe is something to be grateful for.
Your life is your art. Make it a masterpiece.
Light exists, even in the darkest of situations. We don’t always need to see it. We just need to know it’s there.
@betoborge love you bro
You can't convince someone to change, but you can inspire them to.
To walk forward into our future, we have to turn our back on the past.
If you look forward to your greatest potential, you will feel how insignificant your past is compared to your future.
Sometimes unconditional love means giving someone a second or third chance. Nobody’s perfect.
Our limitations are usually self-imposed. The truth is we are capable of so much more than we know.
If you believe it, you can achieve it.
